name: HELL....to WELL (Real Uncesored Version)
description:
HELL to WELL is a short Atmospheric Horror game inspired by urban legend Well to Hell.

Well to Hell is 1000%Hoax

but those sounds are fascinating 

Made with one of the Worst game engines ever created 

I really tried to make a good game but this engine is beyond saving 

this is just a short experiment so take it for what it is 

Enjoy if you can or go to HELL!

yes i use Pirate Copy of Windows and i dont give a shit about it !

game is made with 1$ budget and with game guru(one of the Worst game engines in recorded History)so be fair judge.

some of the stuff is missing because game guru sucks,this is just a short atmospheric experience.

Hint1:When you hear Audio file dont move because game guru mechanics sucks 

Hint2:Dont Run !

Enjoy in my game or Go to HELL !

Warning:My game is full of suprises and if you search 

you will find secret but please Dont 

once you uncover real hell there is no turning back 

Fake or Real you will find out 

We are all Sinners!

Thanks for Playing!!!

Developed by Dzonny Blue(Absinthism Games)

Voice Acting:Dzonny Blue

Level Design:Dzonny Blue

Sound Design:Dzonny Blue

Programming:Game Guru (Lua code) 

Artwork:Royalty Free Fucked Up Medieval Hell Pictures and some of my stuff too !
